questiontext.text: What is the primary goal of linear regression?

answer.text: To model the relationship between a dependent variable and independent variables

feedback.text: Correct! Linear regression models the linear relationship between variables.

generalfeedback.text: Linear regression is a supervised learning method for predicting continuous outcomes by modeling the linear relationship between features and the target variable.
